member.name: SV2CVW2_PARAMS
member.summary: Holds the parameters for the method.

member.name: SV2CVW2_PARAMS.psvPrev
member.summary: A pointer to the interface of the previous view. A Shell view can use this parameter to communicate with a previous view with the same implementation. It can also be used to optimize browsing between like views. This parameter may be NULL.

member.name: SV2CVW2_PARAMS.pfs
member.summary: A structure with information needed to create the view.

member.name: SV2CVW2_PARAMS.psbOwner
member.summary: A pointer to the current instance of the interface of the parent Shell browser. should call this interface's method and store the interface pointer. It can be used for communication with the Windows Explorer window.

member.name: SV2CVW2_PARAMS.prcView
member.summary: A RECT structure that defines the view's display area.

member.name: SV2CVW2_PARAMS.pvid
member.summary: A pointer to a view ID. The view ID can be one of the Windows-defined VIDs or a custom, view-defined VID. This value takes precedence over the view mode designated in the structure pointed to by pfs.

member.name: SV2CVW2_PARAMS.hwndView
member.summary: A window handle to the new Shell view.
